modules.description: Removes diacritics from Latin characters in UTF-8 strings, handling all Unicode normalization forms. It processes strings encoded in UTF-8 and returns equivalent strings with base characters. Use it to normalize text for case-insensitive searches or exact matches in databases.

Converts UTF8 strings to their base Latin characters by removing diacritics, handling malformed input, and replacing non-ASCII characters. Processes Uchar.t values to generate ASCII equivalents, including special quotation marks and control characters. Supports conversion from ISO 8859-1 and CP1252 encodings to UTF8.
